experience: You and Thach both know Keith Rezendes, Chris Cox, and 9 others
Global HR Business Partner + Recruiting Manager

Global HR Business Partner (12/15 - Present):* Leading HR for 650+ global organization including North America, APAC, EMEA, and LatAm, including but not limited to compensation, org design, learning and development, performance management, diversity, executive coaching, immigration, etc.Recruiting Manager (3/14 - 12/15):* Lead an amazing team of Recruiters, Sourcers, and Talent Scouts at the most awesome company in the world!* Headed up full-cycle recruiting efforts for the Employee Experience organization which encompasses HRBP's, Recruiting, Compensation & Benefits, Business Systems/HRIS, Learning & Development, HR Operations, Facilities, Real Estate, Global Food Program, Ground Control (Internal Events & Communications), and Global Citizenship teams* Helped to scale this incredible company from 700 passionate employees to 4500+ and onwards!
Help this awesome 50+ person AR/VR startup optimize its people and recruiting practices

* Offered opportunity to convert full-time after completion of first full quarter (offered to less than ~1% of contractors)* Execute full-cycle recruiting including sourcing, outreach, screening/assessment, offer extension, salary negotiation, closing, and client management for niche, hard-to-fill roles at the coolest company in the world!* Met aggressive quarterly goals by Q3 143%, Q4 167%, and Q1 183% respectively, pre-dominantly through passively sourced candidates and into leadership-level rolesKey Hires:* Head of Diversity Recruiting* Head of Executive Talent Research* Head of Executive Talent Sourcing* Head of Strategic Sourcing Management* Global Leader, Talent Intelligence and Insights

* Honored by President Obama as a National “Champion of Change” and invited to speak on a White House panel * Spearheaded 501(c)3 non-profit organization's overall strategy and vision to address issues of hunger and homelessness, spanning multiple chapters internationally and garnering nationwide media recognition including The White House, MTV, Forbes, NBC, LA Times* Responsible for talent management of Board of Directors and campus leaders, including organizational development, recruiting, training, professional coaching, and succession planning* Managed all day-to-day operations—including chapter development, digital marketing, finance, fundraising, sponsorship/grants, public relations, and legal compliance—resulting in over 57,000 pounds of food collected to date

* Performed full-cycle recruiting for digital commerce and technology/engineering divisions under the leadership of Dan Walker and Ron Johnson, former Apple CTO and Retail Chief* Executed strategic recruiting practices from talent landscape roadmapping and passive candidate sourcing through offer extension and compensation analysis/negotiation for executive-level roles* Directly supported and partnered with SVP-level clients to accomplish recruiting/talent goals

recommendations: Renee Payne
People Analyst at Google
April 3, 2014, Renee worked with Thach in different groups

Thach was my recruiter throughout my hiring process at Google nearly a year ago. Thach did an incredible job keeping me informed, being attentive, and providing accurate feedback to me throughout my entire hiring process. As a candidate, the process can be vague and nerve racking, but Thach always kept me informed of the next steps. He was so friendly and approachable during my onsite interview that I was immediately put at ease. He maintained a balance of professionalism, friendliness, and respectfulness that I appreciated so much as a candidate. Most importantly, he provided me with a valuable first impression of Google by representing the company as a place that only the brightest and sharpest work for. As colleagues in the same staffing org, we have worked together in the selection space, and it is a pleasure working with someone who is so dedicated and hard working. I am confident that Thach will excel in any role he holds in the future!

Deborah Papatonis
Senior Manager, Strategic Procurement
March 19, 2014, Deborah worked with Thach in different groups

What can I say about Thach that others have not already said!  Thach is a rare individual who exudes enthusiasm for the organization for which he works, along with a strong sense of professionalism and personal interest in the individuals he recruits.  He has a great way of bringing out the best in people, and also an excellent judge of ability and character in the people he recruits for the company for which he works.  If I were a hiring manager, I would certainly respect and highly value any recommendation Thach has for a potential candidate.  His ability to question candidates to determine not only their professional experience, but also their ability to socially "fit" into an organization is something you just can't teach,  I sincerely expect to see Thach write a NY Times best-selling human resources management book and/or become an innovative senior executive HR leader.  I would recommend Thach for any position he strives for, without reservation.

Maitreyi Madabhushi
People Operations Recruiter at Google
March 19, 2014, Thach worked with Maitreyi in the same group

As a continuous Talent Spotter, it's hard to not notice the stars! I got an opportunity to work with Thach on 2 different occasions. One was an entry level role and the other a leadership one. Thach surprised me pleasantly by not only proactively sharing candidates but also going the extra step of providing context and information which helped me as I repurposed those candidates for my groups. For the leadership roles that he and I worked on,  Thach helped me understand certain nuances of the recruiting which far surpasses his "years of experience". In my eyes, he is a true leader, someone I see managing a team not too far from now. He is a clear communicator, able to bridge many gaps and a fair person. He is just a wonderful person to have on your team and to interact with on a daily basis. I look forward to more opportunities of working with Thach now and in the future.

Helping purpose-led leaders make shift happen
April 2, 2017, Thach was a client of Wendy’s

We hired Wendy to do some org work during a very exciting but complex time at Airbnb. Given our rapid rate of growth, there was a lack of role and process clarity that made org development work particularly difficult. Enter Wendy.Wendy was our swiss army knife- able to tackle any problem we threw at her with grace and finesse. Everyone was so incredibly impressed by her. She provided thought leadership and expert change management. Anyone would be lucky to have Wendy!

I've had the pleasure to work closely with Renee first as her recruiter and secondly as a colleague within our staffing organization. I cannot say enough positive things about her. She brings so much to a team, not only through her extensive knowledge of the I/O space but also through her willingness to always go the extra mile. I cannot count the number of times she has helped me out in a jam despite it causing an inconvenience to her. She's one of those shining stars that not only brings value by doing great work but by elevating the performance of those around her as well. Be warned future employers: I will recruit Renee back the first chance I get!

Professionally, I am honored to be a part of the Talent team at Airbnb, Glassdoor's #1 Place to Work.
